questions.text: It's Saturday morning. Your first instinct is to…

options.text: Plan the day in a notebook

questions.text: A friend is upset. You naturally…
You describe your ideal home as…

options.text: Lively, full of people and colour
A studio — walls covered in art

questions.text: Your friends would most likely describe you as…

options.text: Talking it out with people you trust
Sitting with the feeling until it's clear
Trusting your gut, then stepping back

questions.text: Which sentence speaks to you most?

options.text: "A place for everything, everything in its place."
"Beauty is in the details no one notices."
"Silence says more than words ever could."
Being stuck alone for too long

questions.text: In a group project you gravitate toward…

options.text: Rallying the team and keeping spirits up
Pure quiet — just you and your thoughts

A.tagline: You build worlds others only imagine.
A.description: Methodical, dependable, and quietly driven — you are the person who turns ideas into reality. You thrive on structure, find comfort in plans, and take deep satisfaction in doing things properly. People trust you because you always deliver.
A.blind_spot: Perfectionism can slow you down. Not everything needs a system.

B.tagline: You make every room feel alive.
B.description: Warm, spontaneous, and magnetically social — you move through the world with an infectious energy that draws people in. You are the spark in the room, the one who makes ordinary moments feel extraordinary. Life gets richer around you.
B.blind_spot: Stillness can be productive too. Not all silence needs filling.

C.tagline: You see what others walk past.
C.description: Perceptive, imaginative, and deeply feeling — you process the world through layers others miss. You create meaning from the mundane, feel beauty acutely, and connect with people at a profound depth. Your inner world is extraordinarily rich.
C.blind_spot: Your depth is a gift — but don't disappear into it. Surface up sometimes.

D.tagline: You carry your home within you.
D.description: Independent, introspective, and quietly powerful — you move at your own pace and on your own terms. You don't need validation from the crowd; your compass is internal. Solitude fuels you, silence is your ally, and your observations cut straight to truth.
D.blind_spot: Connection isn't weakness. Let people in occasionally.
